name: part_005
file: tmp_【 #百鬼あやめ7周年新衣装3D 】百鬼あやめ７周年記念ライブ  ～天女繚華～ 【百鬼あやめ⧸ホロライブ】 [uRa-uLMea7w]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_005.mov

scenes.description: Nakiri Ayame and Usada Pekora perform the song 'I-I-I Love You'.
Interlude section with visual transitions and the logo for Nakiri Ayame.
Nakiri Ayame, Shirakami Fubuki, and Ookami Mio perform the song 'Maware! Setsugetsuka'.

subtitles.original: 避けても結局見えないあいつの胸の内
subtitles.english: Even if I avoid it, I can't see into that guy's heart

subtitles.original: 強がっても背伸びも気取りもいらないかな
subtitles.english: Maybe I don't need to act tough, stretch myself, or put on airs

subtitles.original: 先輩後輩ヤンキージャンキー関係ない
subtitles.english: Seniors, juniors, Yankees, junkies—it doesn't matter

subtitles.original: いざ尋常に勝負
subtitles.english: Now, let's have a fair fight

subtitles.original: 君ともしもその気なら
subtitles.english: If you and I are both in the mood

subtitles.original: ボニータが始まりそうならさ
subtitles.english: If it seems like a bonita is about to start

subtitles.original: まだ見ぬ技繰り出す
subtitles.english: Unleash a technique yet unseen

subtitles.original: 僕らではそうさスウィートだな
subtitles.english: For us, yeah, it's sweet

subtitles.original: アレはどこか同じだね
subtitles.english: That part of us is somehow the same

subtitles.original: 無茶苦茶で無茶苦茶な
subtitles.english: Reckless and messy

subtitles.original: 修羅場派手にドラマが鳴るよ
subtitles.english: The scene of carnage will ring out with drama

subtitles.original: 意味深な like you
subtitles.english: Meaningful like you

subtitles.original: 曖昧な愛より三振
subtitles.english: Better to strike out than have a vague love

subtitles.original: 四の五の言わず愛してちょうだい
subtitles.english: Don't give me any excuses, just love me

subtitles.original: 待って1ミリな手中に鼻血ぶーなのだ
subtitles.english: Wait, a 1mm gap leads to a nosebleed

subtitles.original: 自分の意思はどんなもんじゃい
subtitles.english: How strong is your own will?

subtitles.original: い、い、い、のずきゅん I love you なのだ
subtitles.english: I-I-I Love You

subtitles.original: 四六時中愛をちょうだい
subtitles.english: Give me love all the time

subtitles.original: ほら、い、い、い、掴まきゅん愛、愛、愛、愛はろきゅう
subtitles.english: Look, I-I-I caught you, L-L-L-Love Rocket

subtitles.original: 1/2がたまんない
subtitles.english: Half of it is irresistible

subtitles.original: 恋なんて試練、愛したい試練
subtitles.english: Love is a trial, wanting to love is a trial

subtitles.original: 毎晩一歩先輩たりないや
subtitles.english: I'm one step short of my senior every night

subtitles.original: 不前絶後天真爛漫
subtitles.english: Unprecedented and innocent

subtitles.original: 恋愛無常明鏡止水
subtitles.english: Impermanence of love, a clear and serene mind
Ready, set, 1, 2, 3, go!

subtitles.original: ハッハッハッハッハッハッハッハイヤ
subtitles.english: Ha ha ha...

subtitles.original: ハッハッハッハッハッハッウーサッサッサ
subtitles.english: Ha ha ha...

subtitles.original: これよりご覧頂きますのは私共の栄枯盛衰...
subtitles.english: What you are about to see is our rise and fall...

subtitles.original: 一見は勧善懲悪悪者共を一刀両断...
subtitles.english: At first glance, it's about rewarding good and punishing evil, cutting down villains in one stroke...

subtitles.original: ハッハッハッハッハッハッハッハイヤ...
subtitles.english: Ha ha ha...

subtitles.original: どこからともなく現れてすぐにどこかへ行っちゃう神出鬼没...
subtitles.english: Appearing out of nowhere and disappearing just as quickly, elusive...

subtitles.original: 千変万化人の心は複雑怪奇...
subtitles.english: Ever-changing, the human heart is complex and mysterious...

subtitles.original: もうどうにも満身創痍あぁ巡り巡って夜の街
subtitles.english: Already covered in wounds, oh, wandering around the night city

subtitles.original: 君は合図で踊り出すはぁ〜
subtitles.english: You start dancing at the signal, haa~

subtitles.original: 回れ回れ回れ回れ回れ回れ回れ回れ回れ！華麗に花弁散らすように
subtitles.english: Spin, spin... like scattered petals

subtitles.original: 回れ回れ回れ回れ回れ回れ回れ回れ回れ！髪も振り乱して
subtitles.english: Spin, spin... even with disheveled hair

subtitles.original: 一昨日昨日今日と明日と明後日とこの宴は続く
subtitles.english: The day before yesterday, yesterday, today, tomorrow, and the day after tomorrow, this banquet continues

subtitles.original: 踊れ歌え一心不乱に回れ今宵は雪月花
subtitles.english: Dance, sing, spin with all your heart, tonight is the Snow Moon Flower

subtitles.original: ハッハッハッハッハッハッハッハイヤ
subtitles.english: Ha ha ha...

subtitles.original: ハッハッハッハッハッハッハッハ
subtitles.english: Ha ha ha...

subtitles.original: ねぇねぇこの世に平安訪れるの？...
subtitles.english: Hey, will peace come to this world?...

subtitles.original: 濡れ衣を着せられて一攫千金...
subtitles.english: Being framed, getting rich quick...

subtitles.original: もう全く奇想天外あぁ辿り辿って夜の街
subtitles.english: Simply bizarre, oh, arriving at the night city

subtitles.original: 迷い一つなく踊り出すはぁ〜
subtitles.english: Start dancing without a single doubt, haa~

subtitles.original: 回れ回れ回れ回れ回れ回れ回れ回れ回れ！華麗に花弁散らすように
subtitles.english: Spin, spin... like scattered petals

subtitles.original: 回れ回れ回れ回れ回れ回れ回れ回れ回れ！髪も振り乱して
subtitles.english: Spin, spin... even with disheveled hair

subtitles.original: 一昨日昨日今日と明日と明後日とこの宴は続く
subtitles.english: The day before yesterday, yesterday, today, tomorrow, and the day after tomorrow, this banquet continues
